name: Directors
description: Directors make Penn Labs who we are. They manage both the technical and business sides of Penn Labs to keep us growing and creating new products

name: Penn Basics
description: Making all information at Penn just a few clicks away.

name: Penn Clubs
description: Penn Clubs team is responsible for building and maintaining Penn Clubs, the central source of information about student organizations on campus. Penn Clubs is our newest product and we can't wait to watch it grow!

name: Penn Courses
description: Penn Courses manages all of our services which help students with registration and course planning. Penn Labs was started and built up around Penn Course Review, and the Penn Courses suite has grown since then to include Penn Course Alert and Penn Course Plan.

name: Penn Mobile Android
description: The Android team is responsible for developing the Penn Mobile Android app, which includes developing new features and optimizing current features as well.

name: Penn Mobile iOS
description: Penn Mobile is a tight-knit team of iOS developers and designers. We can usually be found debugging constraint layouts in Swift, trying to figure out why dining hours broke again, or attempting to figure out how the hell caching works. We hope you love using our app as much as we love working on it ??

name: Platform
description: Yo, we're the Platform Team! We consolidate all the software that Penn Labs builds by integrating our products together and making data more accessible to developers. Our goal is to help create the Penn Labs ecosystem and to help the organization scale quickly. (We also built this site!)
